column2:
"That's a frightening face, my lady. Are you dissatisfied with the truth
I mentioned earlier?"
"Of course...! This all started because you Photoners created the Darkers...!"

"However, it was Xion who signed and approved
of the Darkers' origin's creation,
the [Profound Darkness], my lady."
"She must have realized it back then. With her calculative abilities, she should have been able to see the future to an extent."
"What the [Profound Darkness]'s creation would to do the Photoners, that is. She must have known."
"When the Photoners lost their ability to use photons in the fight with the [Profound Darkness], they began to produce ARKS."

"The [Profound Darkness] was sealed,
but the Dark Falz remained."

"And ever since then, the ARKS have continuously fought.
A pointless fight, it is."
"It's not pointless!"
"Nay, it is pointless, my lady."
"Dark Falz have their own respective desires."
"Those desires are influenced by their containers, and corrupted."

"[Elder] is pretty simple to
understand, no? The container's influence was so strong, it forgot its original intent and desired only conflict."

"[Apprentice] is the same, [Loser]...
Well, I didn't change much."
"However, [Double] is different. [Double] wields their power only for their one true purpose."
"True purpose...?"
"But of course, [Profound Darkness]'s revival."
"The quickest way to achieve the revival of the [Profound Darkness] is to eat all the Dark Falz."
"By gathering the [Profound Darkness] with an equivalent amount of Darker factor, it should awaken."
"Just think about it. [Double] has eaten [Apprentice], [Loser], and now [Elder] as well."
"The countdown has already begun."
"The countdown until the [Profound Darkness] revives and annihilates this world, that is."
"1. Then we'll defeat the [Profound Darkness]."
"2. We should defeat [Double] before that."

"The [Profound Darkness] is the parent of all Dark Falz.
It can create as many Falz as it wants, you know?"

"For you guys who struggle against just
[Double], there's no chance of victory."

"Yes, that's probably the only method.
If [Profound Darkness] is revived, it will create more Dark Falz."
"For you guys who struggle against just [Double], there's probably no chance of victory."
"Don't forget though, you're currently stuck in the space that is [Double]'s stomach."
"I don't get it. Just what is the [Profound Darkness]? Why would someone create that?"
"The [Profound Darkness] is an imitation of Xion. A man-made omniscient existence created by Photoners."
"Born of mankind's lethargy, [Profound Darkness] is the omniscient being that uses photons to calculate and govern the universe."
"But since it was the final years of humanity... Lethargy and other negative emotions filled the creation process."
"Photons are very receptive to strong emotions. The greater in number they are, the more radical the effect is on the energy they produce."
"The result is the [Profound Darkness] becoming the avatar of negative emotions and the father of all Darkers. In order to destroy everything in the universe."

"You asked me an interesting
question, my lady. \"Why was it created?\". That's an answer I'd like to hear myself."
"Why she didn't stop its creation, despite foreseeing such destruction."
"But, now I feel I can understand her a little bit."
"My answer would... probably be that she was [lonely], I think."
